K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97a-1: ma ni bha dr'a ya yaksha se na kalpa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-6: tu ru tu ru ma ni bha dra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-7: tu ti tu ti ma ni bha dra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-8: tsu ti tsu ti ma ni bha dra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-9: ni ti ni ti ma ni bha dra sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-11: smyung ba'i cho ga yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-12: aarka dang ni nim pa gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-13: gang yang rung ba'i shing dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-14: nor bu bzang po'i gzugs byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-15: de yi mdun du gnas byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-16: me tog la sogs pa rgya che ba thams cad kyis mchod pa byas shing gnas la nyi ma gung gi dus su yungs kar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-17: tsha ba'i mar gyis bsnos la nor bu bzang po la byug par bya zhing rig pa stong phrag brgya bzlas na gser gyi dong tse brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-19: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-20: na mo ma ni bha dr'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-21: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-26: bya rog gi skad mi grag par phyugs kyi ko ba tsam gyi mandal byas la lan gcig bzlas pas me tog brgyad brgya dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-27: zla ba gcig na gser srang gcig rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-28: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-29: na mo ma ni bha dr'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-30: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-32: bhra ma ri bhra ma ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:97b-35: svi da ya svi da ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98a-2: nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas bzung ste ji snyed dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig gi bar du byas te nyi ma shar ba'i bar du lan nyi shu rtsa lnga brjod na gser gyi dong tse ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98a-3: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98a-4: na mo bee shra ma n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98a-5: ratna me bha b'a ha yam sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98a-6: nyi ma re re bzhin snga bar langs la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na zla ba gcig na dong tse gsum ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98a-7: na mo bha ga ba te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98a-9: aa bi ma svi ka si lu ba to si sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98a-11: skyes pa'i gzugs byas la ku sha'i mtshon gyis bcad na skyugs pa'i nad zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98a-13: tsyee tya ku na dza la sya ti mi gi li phu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98a-14: skud pa dmar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas la rked pa la bcings na rde'u med par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98a-15: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98a-16: ba le ke ha le; ma h'a le sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98a-17: bud med gang la khrag rgyun mi chad pa dang 'bab na khrag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te rked pa la bcings na khrag chad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98b-0: ta la'i lo ma la yongs su sngags te nub mo'i gnas skabs su bzhag la snga bar dkyil @98b 'khor byas te nye bar bzhag la gang na dgos pa yod pa thams cad kyi ming bris te ta la'i lo ma la lan gsum du bzlas la ta la'i lo ma gzhan gyis dkris te bsregs la lag pa la de'i thal ba mnyed na rkun mas mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98b-1: gnas skabs kyis gzhan gyi las kyang cung zad brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98b-2: h'um yig las byas rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98b-3: dur khrod gnas su zhugs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98b-4: legs par bzlas pa zhes byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98b-5: nub mo byung nas dngos grub la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98b-6: 'dir ni grogs su gsol ba gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98b-7: des dur khrod kyi ras blangs la khro zhing mig dmar bas dri zhim pos lus la byugs la dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs te bsgrub bya bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98b-9: sol bas yan lag yang dag par bkang ste yan lag bkug la bcug ste bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan gyi lus kyi snying ga'i padma dkar po la gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98b-10: 'phral du byung ba'i mi'i khrag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98b-11: dug dang bsres te 'bras kyis kha tshogs kyi khu ba dang bcas pas mdzes par byas la lus po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:98b-12: rus pa dang bsres te yang dag par gtor la bsdus te dril la skud pa phra mo nag pos mig bkab la dkri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-0: sol bas phyi rol byugs la dur khrod du @99a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-1: brkos te bcug la bdag gis bsad do zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-2: brkos pa bkang ba'i steng du lag pas rdo rje'i mtshan ma byas la thal bar bya'o zhes sngags kyis bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-3: h'um sum bha ni sum bha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-11: aom sum bha ni sum bha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-15: h'um ma ra ya che ge mo h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-16: rigs kyi ming brjod na nyams pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-17: gal te ma gyur na phyung la de'i dum bu dum bur byas te dug la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i ske tshe dang bcas pas sbyin sreg bya ste blo dang ldan pas dgra bo nyams par 'gyur ba'i ched du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-18: don yod zhags pa'i gzungs ni yongs su bsam bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-19: bandhu ka yi mdog 'dra zhags pa bsnams pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-20: yang dag khros pas sngags kyi mngon du rab byas la; ;bya rog gshog pa dag la de dus bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-21: g-yon pa'i lag pa la ni phat kyi yi ge rnam par dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-22: g-yas pa'i sor mo la ni ta yi yi ge dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-23: zhags pas bcings la thag ni ring po ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99a-24: mi 'dod bzhin du khyer la sngags kyi bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-0: t'i se gol gyis 'di ru khyed kyis yong @99b bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i ngag gis bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-1: bzlas pa rdzogs nas bya rog nag po'i sgro ni bsgrub bya phyogs na yod pa'i sa ru bzlas la bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-2: sngags ni phat hr'i: ha h'um phat che ge mo skrod cig phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-3: g-yon pa'i lag pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas la lci til gyi thal ba khu tshur gyis bzung ste brgya phrag brgyad kyi bar du bzlas la dgra bo'i khyim du bskyur nas phyir mig mi lta bar song la de ma thag tu skrod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-4: aom na ma ku li ni ku li ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-8: autstsh'a ta ya autsts'a ta ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-9: skyes pa'i dar gdong g-yon pa'i rus pa la mtheb chen gyi tshon gang gi tshad la phyag bzhi pa mtshon cha thams cad dang ldan par byas pa'i bgegs kyi bdag po bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-10: mtshon cha'i ming ni g-yas kyi phyag na dgra sta dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-12: g-yon gyi phyag na thod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-16: ske tshe la sogs pas bri ba ni ta la'i lo ma la sngags bris te dkri ba ni kha thur du bstan te sba ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-17: yang na sgo'i phyogs su brkos la sbas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-18: zhag bdun du byas na de ma thag tu skrod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-21: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-22: na mashtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-23: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:99b-24: na mo badzra kro dh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-0: @100a *// damshta ta kata bhee ra b'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-2: aom aa mri ta kunda li kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-8: sarba bighnan bi n'a ya k'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-9: mah'a ga na pa ti dz'i ba ti aanta ka r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-10: de ltar sngags ta le'i gro ga la bris te brkos la sba bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-11: aom k'a ki ka ra pe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-12: k'a ka ki k'a pindo pa h'a ri ni che ge mo'i hra da yam dri shya gatstsha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-13: k'a ki ya th'a su kham aurdham mu khi sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-15: sgron shing la brgya phrag brgyad kyi bar du bzlas te sgo ru brkos te sbas na gang gi ming byas pa bya rog bzhin du rgyu zhing skrod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-16: aom na ma: krishna sha ba ri yee m'am sa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-22: che ge mo dz'a re na grihn'a pa ya aa shu h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-23: rims kyis phag mo'i gza' mig dmar gyi dus su shing nim pa'i lho phyogs kyi rtsa ba la sku gzugs byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-24: tsha ba gsum gyi bdug pas bdugs na 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-25: gu gul gyis bdugs na grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100a-27: mi'i mgo bo'i skra bzung la gtum po dbang phyug gi rkang pa la drud na nyi ma kha cig la rims bskyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100b-0: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la de'i steng du @100b yi ge bam dkar po las char dbab par bsams na snying gar zug gzer byung ba med par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100b-1: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100b-2: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100b-5: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100b-12: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bla ma seng+ge sgra'i sngags 'dis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi mdun du lci bas dkyil 'khor brgyad byas te de'i lci ba'i lhag ma la lan bdun du sngags la lus la nad yod pa'i sa ru byug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100b-13: zhag bdun na nad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100b-14: gal te zhi bar ma gyur na de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dgongs par gyur pa yin no zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100b-15: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100b-16: na mo ma ni bha dr'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100b-17: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa t'a ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100b-18: so bha so kri n'i ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:100b-20: gnod gnas kyi snying po mchog tu grub pa 'di nyid pus mo'i bar tsam chur bcug ste gnas la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na nor ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-0: nim pa'i shing gi rang bzhin la sor bzhi pa'i nor bu bzang po'i sku gzugs byas te gso sbyong dang ldan pa'i lha bzos tshon @101a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-3: gtor ma'i nye bar spyod pa byas la du ba med pa'i sol ba'i me la thun mtshams gsum du spos kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na phyug po chen po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-4: na ma: ka p'a le shva r'a ya dzo hu tu ru rum mu hu r'i ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-5: sngon du bsnyen pa khri byas la de nas 'bras so ba'i khang par yongs su bzlas pa tsam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-6: thod pa bcug pa tsam gyis 'bras kyi so ba 'phel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-7: gi wang gis gro ga la nor rgyun ma'i gzungs mngon par bris to dri zhim pos byugs pa'i bum pa'i nang du bcug ste mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-8: bsnyen bkur byas la bang mdzod kyi khang pa'i dbus su bzhag la steng du 'bras so ba rnams blugs na zad pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-9: mi'i lus po 'phral du bsres pa'i sngags pas de'i thal ba la mngon par sngags nas thal ba blangs te gang du blugs pa'i khyim bdag yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-11: ka ta li ka ta li ke bi di tsi le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-12: na mo bha ga ba te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-16: 'di yang cho ga ni 'di nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-17: na mo bha ga ba te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-20: bi ru p'akisha la ma pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-21: sta ni ma ho da ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101a-23: sha tr'um tri sh'u le na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-0: kruddha shya pi ba @101b sho na tim/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-1: ha na da ha m'ar ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-3: n'a sha ya phat phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-4: au du ma wa ra'i shing gi phur bu rtse gsum pa la skud pa dmar po dkris te ling+ga mdun du byas la phur bu lag tu bzhag la stong phrag gcig tu bzlas te dgra bo'i sgor sbas na skrod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-5: sngon du bsnyen pa ni khri tsho gcig bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-6: aom ae me dru di ru se /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-7: k'a shya aa grihna kra tshantu sa ra sha pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-10: sa ha shya na gu la shya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-20: ma ma ba sha ma ga tu sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-21: nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la ming gi gzugs brnyan byas te ske tshe'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-22: yungs kar gyis gang gi ming nas bzung ste sbyin sreg byas na de 'byed par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-23: aom tsa mundi ni ma bhe d'a ba so ta pa so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-24: sa shya mi ma ba shya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-25: mah'a aattyam pra shya ksham bhanda pa nam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-27: che ge mo m'a gad tstshed bri te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-28: rabha pa tu ra tro tstsha da /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-29: ka la ho bha ba tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-30: pi p'a tstshe da a'a sa ma ga ma sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-31: nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-32: tshes bcu bzhi la brtsams te ni ma pa'i yam shing gis nub bdun gyi thun mtshams su sbyin sreg byas na zhag gsum na 'byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:101b-33: pha mes kyi nags kyi shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-1: brnyan byas te rang gi ming gnyis dug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-4: nim pa'i lo mas byugs la rgyab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-5: rgyab tu sprad de mi ro'i skras bcings na skye 'gro thams cad kyang 'byed par byed na phal pa'i mi lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-6: aom sma s'a na bi sh'a tsa bi dve sh'a tsa bi dve sh'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-7: mi ro'i skra la lan brgya ru bzlas la bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-8: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-9: na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-10: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-11: aom bhe rund'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-12: 'di yis sngon du bsnyen pa ni stong phrag bcu gnyis byas te de nas phyis ni aarga'i shing gi lho phyogs kyi yal ga la bzung ste kha sbyor du byas la de la sngags 'dis bsrung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-13: aom mah'a ba la aa tsa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-15: p'i da ya p'i da ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-16: ti la k'a ma r'u pa h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-24: rigs bdun po'ang lho phyogs su gtogs pa'i shing ro bsregs pa'i sa ru dur khrod kyi mes bsregs te bong bu'i khrag gis bsad la de'i sol ba la bsrung ba byas te sngags 'di yis lan brgyad brgya ru bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-25: aom na mo bha g'arti te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102a-26: aa na ya tyam gi h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102b-0: phyis ni rtsa ba'i @102b sngags kyi brgya phrag brgyad kyis mngon par sngags te gang gi ming bris pa de sha zas bzung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102b-1: ji snyed kyi sngags mkhan kha cig gis grol bar byed 'dod pa thams cad kyis kyang 'grol bar byed mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102b-2: de'i ming phyis na grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102b-3: nim pa la gnas pa'i bya rog nag po'i tshang la nyi ma'i gung la mar nag gis byugs la rtsva skam po des de la mar nag byugs pa rnams dur khrod kyi me la legs par bsregs te bsdus na de'i thal ba thum po byas la khang pa'i thog gi 'og tu bzhag par byas na de'i khyim la rdo'i char pa 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102b-4: aom aa na la bi sh'i tsa ba ya yu ba ga ma h'a pi sh'a tsa sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102b-5: sngon du bsnyen pa khri tsho gcig bzlas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102b-6: de nas au dum w'a ra'i yam shing la stong phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas te lce spyang gi khrag gis bsad de de'i sol bas gang gi ming bris pa de sha zas gzung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102b-7: phyis na ni grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102b-8: dur khrod kyi sol ba'i me la wa'i khrag dang bsres te bsnos la de yis gang gi ming bris pa de ma thag nyid du smyo bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102b-9: phyis na ni grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102b-10: aom tri ne tra si sh'a tsa bho kri ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:102b-11: damshtra bi kri ta mu kha che ge mo mutstsha ta ya bhra ma h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103a-0: bya rog gi sgra mi grag par @103a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103a-1: tshod ma thams cad dang ldan pa'i zan gyis chang bu byin par byas na zhag bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103a-2: aom ka k'i kshi k'a ru di ke k'a ka pind'a nu bho dza ni che ge mo hri da yam gri hye gatstsha k'a k'i ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103a-4: nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103a-5: bcu bzhi la bya rog nag po'i tshang gi shing la tsanda la'i mes stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na phud kyi chang bu la lan bdun sngags te dgra bo'i khang par bskyur te phyir mig mi lta bar byas na zhag bdun phrag gsum na nges par skrod cing de ma thag tu skrod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103a-12: yakshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103a-15: ma me da ni nang gi 'khor lo la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103a-16: yatstsha ni r'a dza sa do ru na yo ni ra zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'i phyi'i 'khor lo'i re'u mig la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103a-17: ro bsregs pa'i shing gi rang bzhin las kha sbyor byas la de'i shing la byas pa'i smyug gus bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103a-18: dpyangs pa'i ro'i steng phyogs kyi thag pa blangs te du ba phyir mi 'byung bar bsregs la de'i thal ba dang bong bu'i chu bsres shing bsnos la snag tsha bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103a-19: kha sbyor de la gang gi ming bris pa de rims chen pos 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-0: 'o mas bkrus na grol @103b lo; ;aom tsi le tsitstshe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-1: tsi li tsi li tsi tstshi li sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-2: zangs ma'i khab kyis phug pa'i ka ra b'i ra dmar po ni yungs kar gyi mar gyis spar ba'i mar me rtse mo la brgya phrag brgyad dus gsum du bsrag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-3: zhag bdun gyis sngon ma mthong ba'i bud med kyang 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-4: aom braham ba ti bi da ra ke sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-5: rgyal po'i chung ma chen mo'ang brdzun min par bzlas pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-7: tsa munda 'di 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas la zhag gcig tu thun gsum du ske tshe'i sbyin sreg byas na 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-10: 'bum phrag gcig bzlas la padma'i skud pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-11: tshil chen pos thod pa ru du ba bsgrub par bya ba thod pa kha brgyad kyi cho gas thod pa gang du dud pa bsags pa de steng du bzhag la chang gis bkang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-12: des mig la bskus na 'jig rten dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-13: dud pa la stobs po che la sogs pa bsrung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-14: gzhan du srung ba ma byas na sha zas khyer ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-15: aom tsandra mu khi ka li bzlas nas gsum gyi dkyil 'khor dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-16: aom kar darbba ya darbba ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-17: na ya na na ma no ha ram sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-18: ka ra ha ra'i rtsa ba la sdong bu byas te phyugs ser skya'i mar gyi du ba bsags la des mig la byugs na dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:103b-19: aom k'a me shva re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-0: @104a *// sbrul nag po'i mgo bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-1: so dz'a na'i dud pa la lan bdun du legs par bzlas te des mig la bskus na dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-2: dbang phyug chen po'i rtags kyi lho phyogs kyi gdong gi thad du 'dug par byas nas khri phrag gcig gi sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i sngags pa des me tog dmar pos bcos pa'i gos dmar po gyon la mtshan mo kun tu 'jigs pa dang bcas pas bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-3: rengs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la de'i sngags bzlas par bya ste khyad par du gza' dang; gzas bzung ba'i dus su stobs po che'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-4: lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur du mthe bong gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-5: rengs par byed pa la gdug pa can rnams kyi mdun du byas na rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-8: aom badzra kro dha mah'a ba la sarba dusht'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-9: stam bha ya stam bha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-10: mo ha ya mo ha ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-12: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-13: na masta smee tsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-18: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-21: pa ra se n+yam tsa kri badzra p'a ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-22: aa ga tstsha sva ba the na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-23: na r'a tse na m'a ra ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104a-24: mchod pa rgya chen po byas la nyi ma re re dur khrod kyi me rab tu spar ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-0: gtsub shing @104b las byung ba'i me dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-3: yungs kar bsres pas sim pa la'i ras bal gyis stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na nam phyed kyi dus su g-yul thams cad nyams par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-4: aom mah'a te dza ma ni bha dra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-5: sam bha ra sam bha ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-6: 'bum bzlas na dngul 'bum rnyed par 'gyur te mthong ba'i chos la yid ches par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-7: aom dzva la dzva la aa ga na ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-9: thal ba la sogs pas kho ra khor yug bcings na 'byung po la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-10: mche ba can la sogs pa mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-11: mthong ba'i chos la yid ches pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-12: rdog pa drag pos brdab pa'i bum pa bcag pa'i dum bu blangs nas snod kyi thog tu 'dug khang steng du mes tshig dus su sngags mam brjod de gnas pas dbyug pa bzung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-13: mam yig brjod pas bum pa bcag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-14: mam yig mo nyid sod par gyur nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-15: sbyor ba 'di ni me mched pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-16: dur ba dang bcas 'bras kyi so la bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-17: slob ma'i dum bu snod du me yis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-18: mchod yon sngags kyis sbyin sreg byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-19: me ni mched par gyur pa zhi ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-20: aad thi ba daksho ba du n'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-21: aa tho pat ta tam ba panytsa n'a m'a d'a yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:104b-22: d'a bi n'a khan tvam dza ta be /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-2: pi d'a bi li pi li /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-5: aadzdzi dharma da na te ba ra aatstsha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-6: a'i dzha tu aa ti h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-13: mes tshig pa'i dus su chu la yongs su bzlas te lan kha cig tu aargha sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-14: chul lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas te khang pa la yongs su gtor na mes mi tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-17: bsnyen pa khri tsho gcig bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-18: de nas dpung pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas te sbar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-19: gang gi tshe mdun phyogs su 'gro'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-20: steng du 'gro na de'i tshe dgos pa 'grub pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-21: yang phyin phyogs su 'gro na dgos pa mi 'grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-22: 'di na nub mo khang pa'i nang du gcer bus bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-23: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-24: na mashtsa badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-25: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-30: nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-31: nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes bcu bzhi la tsha pa'i mar nag gis rkang pa la byugs te nyal na rmi [?] lam na dgos pa ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105a-32: aom ghu na de shra ba na pi sh'a ci sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-0: stong phrag gcig sngon du bsnyen pa dang ldan pas nyal ba'i dus su ru rta'i lde gu la lan @105b nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon par sngags te lag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-1: rkang pa la byugs la mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pa yid la bya zhing gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su nyal na dge ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-2: mi dge ba ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-3: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-5: sngon du bsnyen pa khri tsho gcig bya la 'bras khur gyi rang bzhin las ri khrod ma'i gzugs gcer bu gsum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-6: nyi zla gzas bzung ba'i dus su lag par bzhag la ji srid ma grol gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-7: de nas srod kyi byis pa'i mthong ba'i lam gyi spyod yul du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-8: me long la sogs pa la dpa' mo chen mos bden par ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-9: n'a manna hi kra ma pa da ma btyad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-15: bi da rsha ya ta sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-17: phyi yis rdo rje byas pa byin te sngags khri tsho gcig la khrus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-18: mthe bo la rgya skyegs kyis bskus na 'bebs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-19: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-22: ya da ki na tsi ta sv'am pram tam ga tam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-23: bha byam ta ta sarba darsha ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:105b-24: khri tsho gcig gi bsnyen pa byas la mthe bo la pra se na dbab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106a-0: sngon du bsnyen pa khri tsho gcig bzlas la de nas bsgrub pa bya ste phud kyi zan chang la lan bdun du sngags la rgyab tu bskyur @106a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106a-2: zhag bdun na rnam par ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106a-3: zhag dang po la ma bstan na yi chad par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106a-5: gsum pa ru bsgrubs na bram ze gsod pa'ang 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106a-6: gal te ma grub na spyi bo gas nas 'chi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106a-7: phyag na rdo rje'i bka' ji bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106a-8: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106a-9: a'a aa ma la bi kr'anta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i phyag rgya nye bar gnas la mchod yon la sogs pa thams cad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106a-13: sa gzhi 'di tsam gyi tshad du bdag gis 'di tsam du 'gro bar bya'o zhes yid la byas la phyag rgya bcings la sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brjod par byas na de snyed kyi lam du 'jigs pa med par 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106a-14: khu tshur gnyis gcig tu byas la mthe'u chung gnyis kha phye ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106a-15: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106a-16: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106a-19: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106b-0: sngon du bsnyen pa khri tsho gcig byas la de nas ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la de'i dbus su mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu bris la mda'i sgrol bcom ldan 'das ma'i rang gi ming @106b gi yi ge dang po bkod la bcom ldan 'das ma mchod yon byas te dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106b-4: gtor ma la sogs pas mchod la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106b-5: che ge mo'i yul du 'gro zhing 'ong bar bcom ldan 'das ma 'dir gshegs pa dang lhan cig tu de ru song ste 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das ma la bzod par gsol te bsdu bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106b-6: lam du 'gro na khri khrag gcig bzlas pa byas te cho ga byas nas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la gzhu dang bcas pa'i mda' shar du kha bltas pa mngon par bris la de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das ma sngon bzhin du mchod pa dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106b-7: me tog la sogs pas mchod la brgya phrag brgyad bzlas la 'gro bar bya'o; ;de nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106b-8: song nas phyir 'ongs na de la gzhu mda' dang bcas pa kha rgyab tu bltas pa de bzhin du bris par gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma sngon bzhin du mchod la gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106b-9: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106b-10: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106b-13: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106b-17: t'a re t'a ra aa bha ga ba ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106b-20: mo tsa ni tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:106b-21: 'jigs pa las thar bar byed pa 'di ni kha cig tu 'jigs pa chen po yin na chu bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-0: @107a *// 'brog dgon pa chen por seng+ge dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-6: sha za la sogs pa rnams su sngags 'di dran par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-7: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-12: bam n'a g'a m'a tsa la sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-15: dgra bo la sogs pa'ang khyad par du 'ching ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-16: mi mched par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-18: autpal la'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-19: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la mtheb mdzub gnyis bkug ste mtheb chen gnyis gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-20: gung mo gnyis kyi steng nas srin lag gnyis dkri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-21: de ni autpa la'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-23: aom h'um ba r'a d'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-24: aom h'um bar da badzra ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-25: mchog sbyin pa'i rdo rje 'phags pa 'jam dpal rdo rje dkyil 'khor la gnas pa thams cad kyi bar du gser gyi mdog tu bsams na phyogs bzhi ru kha'i dri zhim par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-26: autpa la'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-27: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-28: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-31: mah'a k'a ru n'i k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107a-33: aom ka tse bi ka tse /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107b-0: @107b lag pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas te rang gi kha yongs su mnye bar bya zhing gos la'ang mdud pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107b-1: de nas rgyal po'i rigs kyi nang du zhugs na khros pa zhi nas dad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107b-8: pi ta aan ta re na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107b-10: danta aan ta re na sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107b-11: shing bu bag tsam gcig la yongs su bzlas la so'i bar du bcug ste bzlas pas khros pa dad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107b-22: 'di'i nye bar spyod pa ni 'og gi gos kyi nang du shing los stan byas la lan bdun du mngon par sngags shing khros pa la byin na cung zad kyang bzlog par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107b-27: tsa au hu aa sa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107b-29: ko me ki tsi bha na ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107b-30: na mo manda t'i ae tsu li p'a sha ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107b-31: lag pa g-yas pas mngon par sngags pa byas la rang gi kha mnye bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107b-32: kha skyengs pa'i sngags te yungs kar la lan brgyad bzlas te gtor na gnyid 'thug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107b-33: aom sv'a ba n'i yam pra tsakshu mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107b-34: siddham sha ba ra bh'a shi tam pa ra tsakra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:107b-37: sa h'a na ri tsanda li m'a tam gi sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-1: phrag brgyad kyis mngon par sngags pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-2: gang du skyur ba de ru gnyid 'thug por byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-3: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-4: na mo bhra ma ra ke shi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-7: mu hya mo ha ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-8: yungs kar la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas te sa la ma reg par bar snang gi khang pa la gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-10: rdo stegs la rab tu gtor na dus ma yin pa'i gnyid 'thug po skyed par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-12: grong khyer gyi dbus su gnas te yungs kar gyis phyogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-13: phyogs mtshams su gtor na sems can kun shi ba dang 'dra bar gnyid log par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-14: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-15: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-18: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-19: t'a re t'a re t'a r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-21: bandha mo tsa ni che ge mo bandha mo ksham ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-22: bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyang dang po nyid du sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-23: bcom ldan 'das mas 'khor thams cad grol bar gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108a-24: gang gis bcings pa grol ba'i bden pa de'i bden pa yis che ge mo bcings pa las grol ba dag tu gyis shig bzlas pas bcings pa grol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-0: bzlas pa'i dus su spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis grol bar byed cing bcom @108b ldan 'das mas kyang grol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-1: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-2: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-5: mah'a k'a ru ni ka ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-9: lambe bi de ma ma moksha yam sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-10: 'di bzlas na bcings pa las grol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-11: yang na gtsang sbra dang ldan par gyur pas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas na bcings pa las grol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-12: na mo de bi mah'a de bi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-14: ta la'i gro ga la mngon par bris te srin bu ka ka ru'i khang bur bcug la de'i sa yis kha bkab cing ming nas bzung bar byas na de bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-15: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-16: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-19: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-21: ku te bi ku te ku te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-22: mar gyis lcags la byugs na 'chag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-23: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satve bhya: ku rutta ku rutta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-26: bskor khang cig gnas na de la rdul la brgya phrag bzlas te gtor na dpag tshad brgya na yod pa 'grol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-27: sngon du bsnyen pa khri tsho gcig bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-28: aa ti mukta'i yam shing la brgya phrag brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:108b-29: de nas de nyid kyi thal bas sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-0: rdo rje'i shing gi yam shing gi me la mar gyi sbyin sreg byas na @109a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-1: lcags sgrog 'chag cing grol bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-2: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-3: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-6: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya; ta dya th'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-11: dza ya ba he tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-12: yul chos kyi rtsod pa las lan ldon pa'i las gzhan las rgyal bar byed pa la sgrol ma sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-15: mu ni lam ge le hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-18: bi li ba da na to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-19: che ge mo sya mu ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-20: bagga ne ne ham pi pee mi sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-24: kha bcings pa rnams ni rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo 'khor bzhin pa'i sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-29: snod kyi sa rnams blangs te gzugs brnyan gnyis byas te kha sprad de bzhag nas skud pa dmar po yis bar mtshams med par dkris la kham kyong ma bsregs pa kha sbyar gyi dbus su bzhag la che ge mo che ge mo'i dbang du gyur cig ces bya ba'i tshig brgya phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-30: da du ra'i 'bras bu byi ba'i khung bur bcug la bud med gcer bus gtun shing gis brdungs na che ge mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-31: che ge mo gnyis dbye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109a-32: rmug pa'i bu mo'i rgyab kyi rus pa la ming dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109b-0: sngags @109b su spel ba mngon par bris te rus pa de'ang lam gyi bzhi mdor rked pa nub tsam brkos pa'i khung bur bcug la sas g-yogs na skrod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109b-1: tsha ba'i rang bzhin gyis gzugs brnyan byas la sngags brjod bzhin pas gzugs brnyan la ra'i pags pas kha dgab par byas na kha bcings par byas pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109b-2: gzugs brnyan de'ang dben pa'i phyogs su bzhag par bya ste dur khrod kyi sol bas dgra bo'i ming dang spel ba byi ba'i khung bur bcug la ra'i pags pas kha bkab ste bud med gcer bus gtun shing lag pas gzung bas lan bdun du mngon par sngags te nub mo che ge mo'i kha chings shig ces brdungs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109b-3: de ltar zhag bdun du brdungs na 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109b-4: rtse mo bdun las byung ba'i sa blangs shing rdza mkhan gyi lag pa'i sa las sa'i khung bu gcig byas la sngags te ta la'i lo ma la mngon par bris te khung bu'i nang du bcug la byi khung du bzhag ste sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas kha bcad la rdul gyis de'i steng du g-yogs na kha bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109b-5: aom bhu ri hya ma na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:109b-6: sa ka tu bra stho ae a'am che ge mo bandha m'a ra dza h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-0: sngags kyi yi ge bar bar du spel la aarka'i lo ma la sol bas bris te dkris la @110a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-1: tsher ma mang po btsug la khang pa'i nang gi steng gi dbus su sngags brgya phrag brgyad bzlas te brkos la sbas na kha bcings par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-2: de ltar mang po'ang so sor bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-3: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-4: na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-5: mah'a yaksha se n'a pa t'a ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-6: p'a r'a y'a sa n'i sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-7: kham kyong du phyugs kyi lci pas gzugs brnyan byas la rig pa bzla zhing 'gron bu dgus brgyan te mig gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-12: bshang ba'i lam du brgyan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-13: dgra bo'i kha ru zhag lon pa'i phyi sa bcug la rig pa 'di'ang lan brgyad brgya ru bzlas te kham kyong gnyis pas kha bkab la gtsang ma'i gnas su bzhag na yul chos las gzhan las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-14: bsnyen pa khri tsho gcig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-15: aom sharka kan tha tsa tu: pa da kh'a hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-16: ma nu sha ko glu tha kam ta shya aa th'a bi glu the na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-17: che ge mo mu kham bandha mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-21: dang po bregs ma thag gi byis pa'i skra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-22: tsher ma rnon po la brgyad brgya mngon par bzlas te byi ba'i khung bur bcug la rdul gyis bkang na kha 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110a-23: ha h'um ha lag pa la bkod na dur khrod kyi bsrung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-0: h'um @110b ha rig pa bzlas te 'phral du ro bsregs pa'i thal ba chang par bzung la yang na de bzlas pas g-yon pa h'um gi phyag rgya bcings te thal ba de dang gu gul gnyis kyi ril bu byas la brgya phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas la dpral bar thig le byas na bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-2: bcings pa las bzlas na grol bar 'gyur ro; ;di aom pri dza pri ti br'i hi br'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-3: bzlas pas bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-4: na mo b'a ts'a ta shya mah'a sha ma na shya ki ti pi ti p'a tram pu ra ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-5: lan bdun du mngon par sngags pa byas pa'i lhung bzed bsod snyoms la zhugs na ster bar mi 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang ster bar 'gyur te myur du lhung bzed gang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-6: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dkar po'i shing gis de bzhin du so shing byas na ma blangs par rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-7: 'jam dpal gyi sa bon gyis lan mang du bzlas pas de ma thag tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-8: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-9: na ma a'arya tse tya kun dza ra shya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-10: hi ma tsa ta aut ta re na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-11: p'a ra she su barna aakshi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-12: na ma: b'a na ri s'a me /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-13: aan nam tsa pha nam tsa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-14: d'a da du sarba ka mi kam aa mo ta tsi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-15: aa mo ti purna bha dra dza se sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:110b-16: bya rog gi sgra mi grag par lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sngags bzlas pa byas na ma blangs par zan rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111a-3: tshod ma kun la nor sbyin gyi gzugs byas la brgya phrag brgyad kyis mngon par sngags la zas btsos pa'i dbus ba zhag par byas na zad pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111a-4: zan btsos pa'i snod du bzhag pa de rang gi gnas nas gzhan du 'gul bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111a-5: aa ram dza re ka ram dza re bhi sham dza re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111a-6: sngon du bsnyen pa khri tsho gcig byas la gzas zin pa'i dus su sran ma ma sh'a la sogs pas bsgrubs nas zos na 'dzin blo rno bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111a-7: na mo ratna tva y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111a-8: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te sha r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111a-18: tri sri khi tri sh'u li /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111a-23: sva ro bhi a'adzny'a pa ya ti dh'a ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111a-24: ai yam ma sa mri dhya tu sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111a-25: de la 'di'i nye bar spyod pa ni sngon du bsnyen pa stong phrag bcu tham pa byas la de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du chu srang bzhi la brgya phrag brgyad kyis mngon par sngags te bzhag la 'thungs na zhag bdun gyi bar du nyi ma gung gung la mar btsod pa'i 'bras za bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-0: zhag bdun du smra bcad byas na gzhung brgya phrag gsum @111b 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-1: mchog tu grub pa'i gzungs ni 'di yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-6: aarkka aanda tsanda li che ge mo me ba sha m'a n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-7: aarka'i lo ma la ming bris te me ru sbyin sreg byas na 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-11: che ge mo ba sha m'a n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-12: mar nag gis chos 'byung la bskus la bdag po chen po dang sbyor ba byas na bdag po 'khol po dang 'dra bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-13: brgya phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-14: aom t'a re h'um ha ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-15: 'dis glang bu'i rva g-yas pas blangs pa'i sa blangs te de dpral bar thig le byas na gang la bltas pa de dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-16: na mo: krishna sh'a ba r'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-19: bi sham bhaksha ya ha ra bi sham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-20: krishna sha ba ro dzny'a pa ya ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-21: sbrang bu chu bsnyung thams cad kyis zos pa'i dug med par byas la rab tu sbyar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-22: aom sha ba ra sho bha na ha re sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-23: sngags 'dis gos la lan bdun du sngags par byas te gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-24: don 'dod pa la sbrang dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-25: mi ro'i me tog dang yang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-26: 'di de phye mar byas sbyar bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-27: mi dang mi mo dbang du byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:111b-32: yungs kar la lan drug cur yongs su bzlas te bud med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-1: la brdeg par byas na 'gying bag dang bcas pa'i bud med dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-5: bi dyu da ji bhe ha na da ha pa tsa che ge mo me ba sha m'a gatstsha tu sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-6: nye bar spyod pa'i phyogs kyi sor mo la shar du mngon par 'dug ste lan bdun du sngags la bstan par byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-7: aom na mo bi ma la k'i rta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-10: mah'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-13: bi ma la ka ra phu:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-14: bi ma la sa muddha re phu:sv'a h'a; chu la lan bdun du sngags te byin na mig gi nad med par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-15: aom na mo bha ga ba te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-20: aakshi ro ga ma tishtha che ge mo sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-21: skud pa dkar po rna ba la bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-30: ra'i chu ngan dang gzhibs la grib ma la bskam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-31: bdug pa 'di ni mchog gi gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-32: gza' rnams kun las grol bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-33: de ru sbrul ni mi gnas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-34: gang gzhan gdug can gza' la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112a-36: brtan por nyin bzhi rims dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-0: thog gi @112b sdong bu ci bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-1: brjed byed kyang 'dis nyams par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-2: skal ba ngan pa'i bud med gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-3: rang byung me tog med gyur cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-4: khyim thab dang ni dbye ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-5: bdug spos 'di yi yan lag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-6: myos shing rab tu gdungs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-7: skal ba bzang po bskyed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-8: bdug spos bram ze gsang bzhengs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-9: las kun byed cing shis pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-10: de la bdug pa'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-11: aom su bhi ra na t'a ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-12: mi'i thod par dbyangs yig bris la bud med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-13: dom phyugs kyi bye brag dang bcas pa bris la gang la sngags rnams lcags kyus bkug na bud med dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-14: gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su lcags kyu'i rnal 'byor gyis bzlas na dpag tshad gcig tsam nas sems dag pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-16: de la bag tsam zhig gis 'dod pas myos nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-18: rlung gis bskor ba'i dbyangs yig dang ldan pas myur du dbyangs yig yan lag bzhag ste bud med 'dod pa la dga' bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-19: aom k'a ma de ba tsandra bha dr'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-20: bha ga b'a na h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:112b-21: 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags te 'di grub pas gsang sngags thams cad grub pa yin no //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-1: smyugs la brgya phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-2: aom k'a ma de ba ha sta ma spri sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-4: lag pa la lan bdun du mngon par sngags la gzhan gang la'ang reg na 'dod pa'i lha brgya byin yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-5: aom k'a ma de ba ni raksha ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-6: sngags 'di mig la yongs su bzlas na gang la bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-7: aom k'a ma de bi bsta sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-8: sngags 'dis gos la mngon par lan bdun sngags te gang la reg pa dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-9: aom k'a ma de ba se ba mu da ma ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-10: sngags 'di rang gi dbang po la yongs su bzlas nas gang reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-11: aom k'a ma shi ri h'um phad/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-12: rgya skyegs kyi shing gis me sbar te yungs kar stong phrag brgyad kyi sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-13: rgyal po'i bu dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-14: 'di yis bud med kyi spyi bor reg na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-15: aom k'a ma de ba aa mu ki me ba sha m'a na ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-17: 'bras bu la yongs su bzlas te gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113a-19: khang pa stong par nya'i phye ma bsregs shing stong phrag bcu bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113b-0: de nas nya'i phye ma bdug pa de bsreg par byas na sna @113b tshogs pa bud med 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113b-1: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113b-2: aom p'a t'a tsa la ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113b-4: sngags 'dis sbyangs nas shi ba'i rkang mthil gyi pags pa la reg na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas la blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113b-5: blangs la phyi mig mi blta bar rang gi gnas su khyer la de nas phyis ni brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags te tsha ba'i mar nag tu bcug la bco bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113b-6: de nas blangs la lan bdun bsngags te rkang pa la bskus na dpag tshad stong du byin yang mi 'chad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113b-10: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113b-13: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113b-18: dha re su bha dri sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113b-19: khri tsho gcig sngon du bsnyen pa byas la nyi ma gzas gzung ba'am /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113b-21: de ltar mi byed na phye ma zhib mor byas te de gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113b-23: badzra dha ra aa nu tsa r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:113b-24: sdigs mdzub la mngon par sngags na sprin rnams gtor bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114a-1: bum la phyogs bzhir mnyam pa'i phyag rgya can 'phags pa rab 'byor tshon sna ma lus pas bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114a-2: rab 'byor gyi g-yas g-yon gnyis su klu gzhon nu gnyis sbrul mgo bdun bdun yod pa phyag 'tshal pa dri bar bya ste de'i sbrul mgo so so la phu'i yi ge bri bar bya ste 'phags pa rab 'byor gyi thugs kar brum bris la me tog sna tshogs pas mchod la steng gab med pa'i gnas su gzhag par byas nas gzhi thams cad chu'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114a-3: so ma btang ba'i kham kyong la tshogs kyi bdag po bris la dug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114a-5: ske tshe dang ldan pas tshogs bdag gi snying gar dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114a-6: h'um ka ra'i nang du bris la phyi rol tu stobs po che'i sngags kyis bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114a-7: seng ldeng gi shing gi me la gdungs na char gcod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114a-8: aom badzra kro dha mah'a ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114a-9: ha na da ha pa tsa bi dhvan sa ya /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114a-12: g-yas pa na rtse gsum pa'i ba dan /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-1: phyi rol du sngags bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-2: aom he ru ka badzra sa ma ya h'i sarba dusht'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-4: mu dr'a pra bha dza ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-6: barsha pa ya barsha pa ya h'um phad/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-7: chang zangs ma'i nang du gzugs brnyan kha thur du bstan te bzhag la sngags bzlas na de ma thag 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-8: gal te zhi bar 'dod na gzugs brnyan 'o mas bkrus na med par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-10: bi sha re bi sha re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-11: sarba bi sha gh'a ta ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-12: lan gsum du rnam par bzlas pa byas na shi ba slongs par byed pa'i dug sel ma'i rig sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-13: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-15: ku m'a ra bh'u t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-18: bha ga ban manydzu shri ku m'a ra bh'u ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-19: sarba ta th'a ga t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-21: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-24: 'brum bu'i nye bar 'tshe ba'i dus su 'brum bu 'byung ba ci snyed pa de snyed kyi grangs la tsandan gyi chu la nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags shing nad pa de la blud cing yan lag byugs na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-27: aa ba lo ki te tutt'a ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-28: tree lokya pi ts'a ri ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:114b-32: sa tye na tu re sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:115a-10: aom dzam bhe dzam bh'a mi /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:115b-10: aom kshu he ka ksha sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:115b-13: ma zhu ba med par byed pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:115b-14: aom kshi kshi sa m'a kshi ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:115b-15: mig gi nad med par byed pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:115b-16: aom ksha pa ya ksha pa ma kshi sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:115b-17: nad thams cad med par byed pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:115b-19: rna ba'i nad med par byed pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:115b-20: sam kshi ba ha prakshi ba sa sam kshi ba ha pra kshi sa pa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:115b-21: dug thams cad med par byed pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:115b-22: aom ha sti ki rni tsu lu tsu lu sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:115b-23: srog chags lcags phye med par byed pa'i sngags so; ;sngags 'dis kha bshal ba'i chu de zhag gcig tu bzhag la gtor na med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:115b-25: mkha' 'gro ma 'ching bar byed pa'i sngags so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:117b-23: che ge mo'i g'a bi aa mu batstsha ge ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:117b-24: ba na au sam ba tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:117b-26: aa kom tsand'a li; b'a bi bi shya ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:117b-27: tshva dang bsres pa'i chus gser gyi dong tse la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sngags la be'u'i mgul par gdags shing de'i chu be'u la gtor na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:117b-28: nor bu bzang po'i rtog pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ji snyed tshad kyi sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rtog pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:117b-29: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta manydzu shr'i dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-003:117b-30: bod kyi lotstsha ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa ////
